short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explorite is a social marketplace that connects students through social networking at local colleges.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Students can use Explorite to Buy, Sell and Swap textbooks, as well as other goods with other students. Explorite is the perfect place to share lecture notes, keep up with friends, finding a new roommate, housing, jobs, events and parties that are happening around campus.
